channel.title: Please read!
channel.description:
Hey guys i needed a little help. so what i need help with is making everywhere a pk zone and banks safe zone. im trying to make a pk server, and right now its just all safe zone besides edgeville, etc.
Thanks

item.title: Please read!
item.dc:creator: @B0SS B0SS
item.description:
@B0SS wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:7, topic:493282”][quote author=B0SS link=topic=611514.msg4241021#msg4241021 date=1361830839]

[quote author=Flame_ link=topic=611514.msg4241019#msg4241019 date=1361830708]

there are many guides…
http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-317-create-funpk-area-487843/

just change the coords
[/quote]ok but im using trisidiax and its a 508?

Stop. Now.
[/quote]why?

You don’t know what your doing.[/quote]well sorry its a 317 and i looked at the guide and mine doesnt look the same and obviously i dont know what im doing thats why im trying to get help… the sections named “server help”

Read full topic

[TuT - A] [317] How to Create a FunPk Area - RaGEZONE - MMO development...

How to Create A FunPk Area Description: To make sure that you do not lose things in a pk area where you do not lose things. This is something you cannot code yourself so I will

just change the coords

Stop. Now.
